description: TrueNAS dashboard using Prometheus with graphite endpoint as data source.

targets.query: SELECT last("value") FROM "uptime"
SELECT last("value") FROM "mnt-MediaPool_df_complex_used" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM "mnt-MediaPool_df_complex_used" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM "mnt-MediaPool_df_complex_used" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("percent.system")+ last("percent.user")+ last("percent.interrupt") FROM "cpu-average" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT * FROM "vmx0_if_octets_rx" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT * FROM "vmx0_if_octets_rx" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT * FROM "vmx0_if_octets_rx" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM "memory.free" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM "memory.active" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT last("c")+ last("p")+ last("dbuf_size")+ last("dnode_size")+ last("hdr_size")+ last("metadata_size")+ last("mfu_ghost_size")+ last("mfu_size")+ last("mru_ghost_size")+ last("mru_size") FROM "cache_size" WHERE ("resource" = 'zfs_arc') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT * FROM "da1.temperature"
SELECT * FROM "da1.temperature"
SELECT * FROM "da1.temperature"
SELECT * FROM "da1.temperature"
SELECT * FROM "da1.temperature"
SELECT * FROM "da1.temperature"
SELECT last("value") FROM "memory-free"
SELECT last("value") FROM "memory-free"
SELECT * FROM "vmx0_if_octets_rx" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT * FROM "vmx0_if_octets_rx" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

title: Customized TrueNAS dashboard
